sentences.sentence: While the researchers assumed that the well-structured daily plans would be most effective when it came to the execution of tasks, they were wrong: the detailed daily plans demotivated students.
sentences.translation: 虽然研究人员认为，当涉及到执行任务时，规划很好的日常计划是最有效的，但他们错了，详细的日常计划会让学生失去动力。

sentences.sentence: "Your team is demotivated" : a lack of adequate face time with their Product Owner causing the team to lose motivation.
sentences.translation: “你的团队在敷衍塞责”：缺少跟产品负责人面对面的沟通，团队缺少动力。

sentences.sentence: Our staff is demotivated and we need your support to ensure that they start coming to work and our health system is revived.
sentences.translation: 我们的医务人员很消极，我们需要援助来确保他们开展工作和恢复我们的卫生系统。
